content: this pattern was originally released as a mystery kal in march 2025 this year s theme for the solid socks group kals is nature and the seasons the word spring can also mean the source of a river in this design the geometric patterns are reminiscent of boats floating down stream to the river mouth join the kal here solidsocks /groups/solidsocks group specific thread https //www ravelry com/discuss/solidsocks/4351688/1-25 1 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/solidsocks/4351688/1-25
